medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Gradual onset of epigastric pain 2 days ago associated with nausea but no vomiting. The pain increases with movement, eating, walking, and small bumps in the road when driving. Endorses dark urine and no bowel movement in a couple of days, however has been passing gas. No fever, but has chills. Also complains of itching and poor oral intake due to the pain. Ongoing nausea noted on the floor, but pain was controlled after receiving morphine.
medical_history.family_history: Father with renal disease, chronic pancreatitis (unknown cause), and diabetes mellitus. Sister with vascular tumors.
